New Records: England has now won three of four penalty shootouts under Gareth Southgate’s eight-year tenure as manager
Key Match Events: Trent Alexander-Arnold scored the winning goal during the penalty shootout
Bukayo Saka scored with a shot off the post in the 80th minute to cancel out Breel Embolo’s goal for Switzerland
Switzerland's Manuel Akanji had his penalty kick saved by England's goalkeeper Jordan Pickford
Pre-Game Insights: England manager Gareth Southgate defended the team's'streetwise' approach to winning games
Southgate said he kept talking to Trent Alexander-Arnold to keep his confidence up after being benched for the first two Euro 2024 games
Post-Match Reflections: Southgate said he's proud of the team's character, belief, heart, and spirit
Switzerland coach Murat Yakin said he's sad for the players after losing to England in the quarterfinals
Miscellaneous Highlights: England goes on to play Netherlands in Dortmund on Wednesday for a spot in the final
Switzerland exits the European Championship on penalties in the quarterfinals for the second time running
This was the second game in a row that England left it late to win, after beating Slovakia 2-1 in extra time in the last 16
